# ClipboardGetFunc delegate

```csharp
public delegate void ClipboardGetFunc(IntPtr clipboard, IntPtr selection_data, uint info, 
    IntPtr user_data_or_owner);
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| clipboard | Transfer ownership: none |
| selection_data | Transfer ownership: none |
| info | Transfer ownership: none |
| user_data_or_owner | Transfer ownership: none; Nullable: true |

## Return Value

Transfer ownership: none
